description: Seasonal labor challenges are addressed through democratic planning
content:
Scenario: Seasonal labor challenges are addressed through democratic planning
    Given agricultural work is inherently seasonal creating income volatility
    And farmworkers traditionally face periods of unemployment and poverty
    When democratic governance addresses seasonal labor democratically
    Then year-round base income is guaranteed through diversified farm activities
    And off-season work includes equipment maintenance, planning, and training
    And EAE network coordination provides cross-employment opportunities during slow periods
    And income stability improves farmworker financial security dramatically
    And workplace_elohim coordinates seasonal labor solutions across network
